sentences: Suzuko Mimori (三森すずこ, Mimori Suzuko, born June 28, 1986) is a Japanese actress and singer.
She met the president of Bushiroad, Takaaki Kidani, during one of her stage musicals which led to her being offered a chance to become a voice actress and auditioning for her first role in 2008.
From July to October 2009, she was a member of the singing group Cutie Pai as Suzy (which is the diminutive form of her given name).
From 2011 to 2016, Mimori was member of a mini unit in the Love Live!
In April 2019, Mimori announced her marriage to New Japan Pro-Wrestling wrestler Kazuchika Okada.
